name: titles_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool moviesdatabase.
Tool description: MoviesDatabase provides complete and updated data for over 9 million titles ( movies, series and episodes) and 11 million actors / crew and cast members
API description: Fetches movie title details from the Movies Database API using the given IMDb ID.

is_id.description: The IMDb ID of the movie title (e.g., 'tt0000002').

info.description: The type of information to retrieve (default: base-info). Options include 'base_info', 'mini_info', 'image', etc.
